body: Introduction to robotics systems with emphasis on robotic motion and control, and robotic components such as actuators and sensors.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 481)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 483: Introduction to Automation and Robotics Systems
